channel.title: Comments on: Photoblogger Captures Purse Snatcher

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: Thats cool. Always good to see people attempting to help in some way, even if it is just by yelling at the guy. Its a lot better than the people stepping over and taking camera phone photos of a woman bleeding and dying in a store! I'd imagine if people would take the time more often to stand up for others, there would be less petty crimes and assault like this.
item.content:encoded: Thats cool. Always good to see people attempting to help in some way, even if it is just by yelling at the guy. I’d imagine if people would take the time more often to stand up for others, there would be less petty crimes and assault like this.
